The worldwide detergent industry is valued at 133.3 billion euros in the year 2016. However, the demand for the laundry product in Europe is being dominated by the ever increasing popularity of detergent products. The continent has witnessed incredible growth in the consumption of detergent commodities and merchandise over some time. Therefore, being said that the 2019 global detergent market was to be 120 billion euros and the market comprehended that the numbers are ever growing with the passing year.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/detergent-blog-post-gmci.jpeg” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.2″ vertical_offset_tablet=”0″ horizontal_offset_tablet=”0″ z_index_tablet=”0″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Amidst the ever-broadening demand of the detergent industry among the masses, the market is highly saturated with global vendors such as Procter & Gamble and Church & Dwight Co. Inc, accounting for more than 67% of the developing sales for the detergent. GMCI, thus proudly announced itself to be crowned as one of the leading raw materials manufacturer and suppliers of the ever-advancing detergent industry. GMCI offers customers high-quality products by using environmentally friendly methods which are natural minerals and chemicals or customized substances.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/detergent-blog-post-gmci-minerals.png” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ vertical_offset_tablet=”0″ horizontal_offset_tablet=”0″ z_index_tablet=”0″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Stay clean and stay hygiene

GMCI is renowned foroffering an overall package of commercially used detergent products which are accordingly customized to fit each and every need of the consumers and additionally sustainable and toxic-free to the environment. GMCI is known to deliver a widened category of raw materials that further assist in manufacturing common most cleaning chemicals, washing powders, surface cleaners, disinfectants, specialty cleaners, and laundry detergent products.The materials and cleansing commodities supplied by GMCI are further incorporated in manufacturing soaps for household usage, washing clothes detergent, toilet soaps, textile cleaners, and liquid detergent for cleaning woolen fabrics.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/detergent-blog-post-gmci-pvt-limited.png” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ vertical_offset_tablet=”0″ horizontal_offset_tablet=”0″ z_index_tablet=”0″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Multipurpose detergents for your luxuries

GMCI fabricate detergent products with antioxidants and fabric brighteners that soar deep into the fabrics and eliminate all the stubborn stains and dust. GMCI advocates those products that make fabrics all bright, clean, and fantastic. GMCI’s detergent cleaning products formulas counter difficult stains and provide the fabric with new touch and glory. The detergents are manufactured with natural products and devoid of harmful petrochemical surfactants. GMCI assures you with environment-friendly products which cater to every hygienic requirement for you.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/detergent-blog-post-gmci-pvtltd.png” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ vertical_offset_tablet=”0″ horizontal_offset_tablet=”0″ z_index_tablet=”0″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The comfort for your fabrics

GMCI supplies a wide range of raw materials, chemicals, and minerals across the globe. The category ranges from Zeolite 4A, SLES, SLS, and Quartz. Their production maintains every protocol and international regulatory standards of cleanliness and controlled manufacturer. GMCI announced itself a proud supplier of raw materials for Asia, Middle East and the USA as well. The detergent industry is fabricated with its worldwide supplies and manufacturers.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/The-essence-of-lavender-soap.png” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ vertical_offset_tablet=”0″ horizontal_offset_tablet=”0″ z_index_tablet=”0″ box_shadow_horizontal_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_vertical_tablet=”0px” box_shadow_blur_tablet=”40px” box_shadow_spread_tablet=”0px” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The essence of lavender soap

GMCI ensures products of great range effluent quality of raw materials chemicals and minerals that provide you the assistance of topmost quality. International regulatory standards are used under the clean and controlled conditions while producing chemicals like Quartz. There are a wide range of minerals like Zeolite 4a, Sodium Lauryl Ether Sulfate and other chemicals like Sodium Laureth Sulfate.With GMCI, you are always assured with top level standards.
